relevant_communication: The organisation arrange national/international conferences  regarding environmental, contribute as speakers in other events, runs a website, faebooksite, twitter, electronic newsletter and a paper magazine. We update and issue fact sheets about ca10 basic topics rgarding noise (house quality/neighbours/traffic etc), participate in parliament and government hearings, and deal with approx 1200 requests from the public every year.
goals__remit:
The Norwegian Association Against Noise, founded in 1963, is a politically independent environmental organization receiving financial support from the Ministry of Environment/The Norwegian Climate and Pollution Agency.  
Our goal is to prevent and reduce environmental noise, contribute to better quality of life, and improve health, by participating in public hearings, national information campaigns and advisory to the local authorities and public in general.
